name: openapi-toolkit
description: generation of API client libraries (SDK generation)
author: Bar Nuri

scripts.preupload: rimraf dist && npm run build && git push
scripts.test:typescript: npm run build && node ./dist/cli-generate.js -i ./src/openapiSchemaExample.json -g typescript-axios -o ./test --modelNamePrefix My --modelNameSuffix .dto.test && tsc --build tsconfig-test.json
scripts.test:csharp: npm run build && node ./dist/cli-generate.js -i ./src/openapiSchemaExample.json -g c# -o ./test-csharp --modelNamePrefix My
scripts.test:python: npm run build && node ./dist/cli-generate.js -i ./src/openapiSchemaExample.json -g python -o ./test-python --modelNamePrefix My --modelNameSuffix .dto.test
